section.title: Movable Type entry export to blojsom conversion
section.p: The source to the Perl script to convert a Movable Type export file to a blojsom (or blosxom) directory tree is available here. Perl script courtesy of Pierre-Alexandre Losson. These were his instructions from his e-mail.
section.source:
It handles TITLE, BODY, DATE, and CATEGORY ..
It can be called like this :
perl mt2blojsom.pl [MT EXPORT FILE] [BLOJSOM DATA DIR]
ex : perl mt2blojsom.pl mt.txt /var/blojsom/data

section.title: Share your contributions
section.p: Have you written a plugin, extension, or any other piece of nifty source code you're willing to share with the blojsom community? Well, then drop me an e-mail and I'll get you added to this page.
